data.title: Paediatrics
data.meta_description: Information about the Paediatric Services at the Cardiff and Vale University Health Board
data.meta_site_name: Cardiff and Vale University Health Board
data.text:
General Paediatrics Inpatient and Outpatient Services are located within the University Hospital of Wales, University Hospital Llandough and the main Children's Hospital for Wales building.

Paediatrics is based in the University Hospital of Wales where there are 131 paediatric beds.

There is a Paediatric Intensive Care Unit (PICU), a High Dependency Unit (HDU), a Clinical Investigation Unit and an Assessment Unit.

The Department of Child Health at Cardiff University is closely associated with the teaching, research and clinical services at the hospital.

Paediatric Services

Paediatric Critical Care

Paediatric Diabetic Services

Paediatric Allergy, Asthma and Eczema Services

Paediatric Psychology
